scripts.dev: npm run services:up && concurrently "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server"
scripts.services:up: docker compose up -d mongodb postgres redis mailhog localstack mongo-express pgadmin redis-commander
scripts.services:logs: docker compose logs -f mongodb postgres redis mailhog localstack mongo-express pgadmin redis-commander
scripts.services:restart: docker compose restart mongodb postgres redis mailhog localstack mongo-express pgadmin redis-commander
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf client/node_modules && rm -rf server/node_modules
scripts.build:all: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.test:all: concurrently "cd client && npm test" "cd server && npm test"
scripts.lint:all: concurrently "cd client && npm run lint" "cd server && npm run lint"
scripts.docker:rebuild: npm run docker:clean && npm run docker:prune && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:up
scripts.docker:clean:localstack: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:clean && docker volume rm ${COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME:-mernpern-starter}_localstack_data && npm run docker:up
scripts.docker:clean:all: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:clean && docker volume prune -f && npm run docker:up
scripts.docker:reset: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:clean && docker system prune -f && docker volume prune -f && npm run docker:up
